<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/users/all"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Permissions:**
`Admin, SuperAdmin (Consumers)`
`Admin, SuperAdmin (Publishers)`
